content: well I care welcome back time to assemble the tiles I'm gonna let the
video play and not do a lot of cuts like I normally do because I want you to see
how I handle certain things and apply the corrugation cover that kind of thing
meantime I'll play music so where I'm not talking there'll be some music
playing the first person to comment where this music comes from will win
nothing but because I don't have a budget and I woke up yesterday and
decided to start a YouTube channel so for the remainder of this miniseries I'm
going to focus on building two tiles a side and a corner so we'll need eight
squares here I have eight of the one and a quarter inch squares and eight of the
one-and-a-half inch squares the process is very simple glue a small square onto
a large square try to ensure that your minor features are not along the same
side in order to create some variation now let's build the walls
first we'll work on the side tile remember this foundation is not square
so first I'm going to check which was the shorter direction because that is
the side to which I must glue the wall the great thing about double corrugated
cardboard in addition to its strength is that there's a lot of room for hot-glued
spread out for me an extremely strong bond
you you
next we do the foam brick facade measure out two and a half light
and cut peel the paper off one side only take
your knife and score down the middle but not through the paper on the other side
similarly score along the side to create a brick pattern
use a mechanical pencil with the lead all the way in to deepen the cracks
when hot-gluing ensure that a thick bead is in the corner so that the glue
spreads out to touch the foundation and the wall
you finally glue the black strips to the
exposed corrugation double corrugated cardboard is 1/4 inch thick I use black
paper because it doesn't need to be black bombed and I coincidentally
already had some you
at this point assembly is complete do not yet attach the squares to the tile
that will be the final step after painting is complete join me in video 4
see you there
